title: Beginner Python
description: Start learning Python basics with simple and clear examples.

content.heading: Introduction to Python
content.code:
# Python is a beginner-friendly programming language used for web, AI, automation, and more.
print('Welcome to Python!')

content.heading: Data Types
content.code:
# Common data types: int, float, str, bool, list, tuple, dict
x = 5
y = 3.14
name = 'Alice'
flag = True
lst = [1,2,3]
tuple_example = (1,2)
dict_example = {'a': 1}
print(x, y, name, flag, lst, tuple_example, dict_example)

content.heading: If-Else Conditions

summary: You learned variables, data types, conditions, and loops.
